mapper.select: SELECT M.MEM_NO, M.MEM_ID, M.MEM_PW, M.MEM_NM, M.MEM_PHONE, M.MEM_GEN, M.MEM_BD, M.MEM_PW_GBN, M.MEM_PWA, M.LEVEL_NO, C.CARD_NO FROM MEM M LEFT JOIN CARD C ON M.MEM_NO = C.MEM_NO WHERE M.MEM_NO = #{mem_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEM(MEM_NO, MEM_ID, MEM_PW, MEM_NM, MEM_PHONE, MEM_GEN, MEM_BD, MEM_PW_GBN, MEM_PWA, LEVEL_NO) VALUES (MEM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{mem_id}, #{mem_pw}, #{mem_nm}, #{mem_phone}, #{mem_gen}, #{mem_bd}, #{mem_pw_gbn}, #{mem_pwa}, '1' )
mapper.select: SELECT MEM_PW FROM MEM WHERE MEM_NO=#{mem_no} AND MEM_DEL=1
SELECT TM.MEM_NO, T.TEAM_NO, T.TEAM_NM, TM.APPLY_STATE FROM T_MEM TM INNER JOIN TEAM T ON TM.TEAM_NO = T.TEAM_NO WHERE TM.MEM_NO = #{mem_no}

WITH RESLIST AS( SELECT M.MATCH_NO, M.SPORT_NO, S.SPORT_NM, M.TEAM_NO, M.TEAM_NM, M.PLACE_NM, M.MATCH_CON, MATCH_DT, M.MATCH_FILE, M.MEM_NO, M.MATCH_PAY, M.MATCH_STATE, M.MATCH_DEL FROM (SELECT M.MATCH_NO, M.SPORT_NO, NVL(T.TEAM_NO, 0) TEAM_NO, NVL(T.TEAM_NM, '개인') AS TEAM_NM, M.PLACE_NM, M.MATCH_CON, TO_CHAR(M.MATCH_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MATCH_DT, M.MATCH_FILE, M.MEM_NO, M.MATCH_PAY, M.MATCH_STATE, M.MATCH_DEL FROM MATCHES M LEFT JOIN TEAM T ON M.TEAM_NO = T.TEAM_NO WHERE MATCH_DEL = 1) M, SPORT S WHERE M.SPORT_NO = S.SPORT_NO AND M.MEM_NO = #{mem_no} UNION ALL SELECT M.MATCH_NO, M.SPORT_NO, S.SPORT_NM, M.TEAM_NO, M.TEAM_NM, M.PLACE_NM, M.MATCH_CON, MATCH_DT, M.MATCH_FILE, M.MEM_NO, M.MATCH_PAY, M.MATCH_STATE, M.MATCH_DEL FROM (SELECT M.MATCH_NO, M.SPORT_NO, NVL(T.TEAM_NO, 0) TEAM_NO, NVL(T.TEAM_NM, '개인') AS TEAM_NM, M.PLACE_NM, M.MATCH_CON, TO_CHAR(M.MATCH_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MATCH_DT, M.MATCH_FILE, M.MEM_NO, M.MATCH_PAY, M.MATCH_STATE, M.MATCH_DEL FROM MATCHES M LEFT JOIN TEAM T ON M.TEAM_NO = T.TEAM_NO WHERE MATCH_DEL = 1) M, SPORT S WHERE M.SPORT_NO = S.SPORT_NO AND M.MATCH_NO IN(${match_no}) ) SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT MATCH_NO, SPORT_NO, SPORT_NM, TEAM_NO, TEAM_NM, PLACE_NM, MATCH_CON, MATCH_DT, MATCH_FILE, MEM_NO, MATCH_PAY, MATCH_STATE, MATCH_DEL, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY MATCH_NO DESC) AS RNUM FROM RESLIST)ML
